Description:
COLLECTING POOL OF CANDIDATES FOR OUR UPCOMING PROJECTS IN IRAQ!Description:Full understanding of projects’ requirements concerning time, cost and quality.
Develop project innovative concept design to fulfil client’s requirements and project’s needs.
Develop project’s concept design and prepare detail design drawings.
Prepare Architectural permitting drawings, and assure full compliance with all Authorities’ requirements, regulations and international standards.
Coordinate with all disciplines at all stages to develop a fully coordinated project.
Study, analyze and provide technical solutions for design problems.
Meet clients/ Developers/ Authorities for technical discussions when required.
Drive innovative and cost-effective solutions into the design.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor’s degree in Architecture/Architectural Design.
Ability to lead mid-size projects and coordinate fully with other disciplines.
